title: Woman dies in two-vehicle crash near Dalhousie
description: A 49-year-old woman from Lorne died in a two-vehicle collision near Dalhousie.
content: A year old woman from Lorne has died in a two vehicle collision near Dalhousie The collision happened on Route in Point La Nim just before a m Wednesday RCMP said in a news release A vehicle travelling north crossed the centre line and was chars
